text: Gumazitam Godɨn ganizir puvatɨ. Gumazitam Godɨn borir a garir igharazibagh ifueghan koghɨva, egh a manmaghɨn Godɨn a ganizir puvatɨzim gifuegham? Puvatɨ. An a gifueghan kogham. Ezɨ e kamaghɨn fo, gumazitam suam, Kɨ God gifonge, egh Godɨn borir igharazim gɨfueghan koghtɨ, e fo, a gumazir ifarim.
